programme.title: The Big Cases
programme.sub-title: The Sycamore Gap: From Roots to Ruin
programme.desc: A single tree, growing in a natural dip along Hadrian's Wall in Northumberland, is destroyed overnight, and a community is left reeling; who chopped down the tree at Sycamore Gap and why?
